name: Shave my Beard! - Barber Spa
description:
Do you think your daddy's beard is always messy? Do you think that shaving it could be fun? If so, tell him to cut that facial hair right now!

Invite your daddy to the shaving salon where he can enjoy a prince makeover and have a wonderful new look. Trim his moustache, play with the shaver, go to the hairdresser and design a new hair style too. Help him to become a true handsome prince!

Tell your daddy to cut that facial hair now and invite him to this awesome beard salon! Shaving is fun! He does not need to have a messy beard anymore! It's time to cut the facial hair and show off a perfect prince beard. What are you waiting for to forget that old, messy beard? Welcome to the shaving salon! Play now!

Features of this amazing cut and trim beard salon:
- Help your daddy to get rid of that messy beard shaving his facial hair!
- Cut his hair and design a new hair style with the hairdresser!
- Have hours of fun in this beard salon and have the perfect daddy!
- Share pictures of your new beard looks with your friends!

There is no need to have a messy beard anymore! Come visit the daddy shaving salon and learn how to achieve the perfect beard looks and styles! Cut that facial hair now and have fun! Play now!
